::: {#hero-heading}

I am a PhD student (expected to graduate in 2026) of [AudioCC Lab](https://audiocc.sjtu.edu.cn) at [Shanghai Jiao Tong University](https://en.sjtu.edu.cn/), majoring in Speech and Audio Understanding and Generation, Supervised by Prof. [Yanmin Qian](https://audiocc.sjtu.edu.cn/zh/members/yanmin.qian). Before that, I received the Bachelor's Degree from Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2020.

My research focus on Speech Synthesis, Sound Analysis, Speaker Verification, Anomalous Sound Detection and so on.

Note: **I am currently looking for full-time industry job** (e.g. Speech Large Laguage Models, Audio Generation, Audio Representation and so on). Please feel free to contact me.


## Education Background
- 2022-Now: Master's to Ph.D. in Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China, focusing on audio generation, analysis.
- 2020-2022: Purchase Master in Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China, specializing in Speaker Recognition.
- 2016-2020: Obtain Bachelor's Degree of Engineering, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China, majoring in Computer Science of **IEEE honor class**.
